mapper.sql: pageid, orgid, branchid, templateid, name, snapshot, ratio, height, width, limitflag, privilegeflag, touchflag, homeflag, homepageid, homeidletime, status, description, createtime, updatetime, createstaffid
mapper.select: select from page where status=1 and homepageid = #{homepageid}

select count(1) from staff s, page p, branch b where p.branchid=b.branchid and (s.branchid=b.branchid or s.branchid=b.parentid or s.branchid=b.parentid2 or s.branchid=b.parentid3) and s.status = 1 and p.pageid = #{pageid}
and s.name like #{search}
mapper.delete: update page set status='9' where pageid = #{pageid}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
